sentences: Virgil Popa (born 8 October 1975) is a Romanian-born Spanish conductor.
Currently he is the in-house conductor of the Stradivari Symphony Orchestra.
Virgil Popa was born in Roma, Romania within a family of amateur musicians.
At fourteen he began studying double-bass at the Institute of Arts Stefan Luchian of Botoșani, which had just reopened after the fall of the dictatorship.
He continued his studies of the double-bass in the George Enescu University of Arts of Iași and in 1999 he was graduated in Music with the specialty in double-bass.
In 2005 he founded the International Orchestra of Madrid and performed acclaimed concerts in major concert halls throughout Spain.
